General.Name: Huitong Construction Group Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Huitong Construction Group Co.,Ltd. engages in the highway, municipal road, and housing construction engineering and related building material sales, survey and design, and testing businesses in China. Huitong Construction Group Co.,Ltd.was founded in 1998 and is based in Gaobeidian, China.

1.Name: Ms. Jing  Du
1.Title: Chairman of Supervisory Board & Head of HR Department
